--- title: molmapnets keywords: fastai sidebar: home_sidebar summary: "Neural networks for MolMap generated features." description: "Neural networks for MolMap generated features." nb_path: "index.ipynb" ---
{% raw %}
{% endraw %}

This package implements the neural network architects originally presented in the MolMap package, with two important differences:

  • The package is written using literate programming so the implementation, testing, and documentation are done together. You can find the documentation on the package blog site.
  • The models are implemented in PyTorch.

Install

First you need to install MolMap and ChemBench (you can find the detailed installation guide here, then simply

pip install molmapnets

How to use the package
